price: 73 Allah, en vérité, est toute bonté envers les hommes qui, pour la plupart, ne sont pas reconnaissants.
arabic: وَإِنَّ رَبَّكَ لَذُو فَضۡلٍ عَلَى ٱلنَّاسِ وَلَٰكِنَّ أَكۡثَرَهُمۡ لَا يَشۡكُرُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: wa-inna rabbaka ladhū faḍlin ʿalā al-nāsi walākinna aktharahum lā yashkurūna
